org.sbmlsqueezer.io
Class ODEwriter

java.lang.Object
  org.sbmlsqueezer.io.ODEwriter

public class ODEwriter
extends java.lang.Object

This class writes the differential equations given by the KineticLawGenerator to a LaTeX or plain text file.

Since:
2.0
Version:
Author:
Andreas Dräger (draeger) , Nadine Hassis Copyright (c) ZBiT, University of Tübingen, Germany Compiler: JDK 1.6.0

Constructor Detail

ODEwriter

public ODEwriter()

Default constructor.

ODEwriter

public ODEwriter(java.io.File file,
                 KineticLawGenerator klg)
          throws java.io.IOException

This constructor analyzes the given file. If it ends with "*.txt", a plain text file will be generated, which contains the ordinary equation system. If the file ends with "*.tex", the system will be written into a LaTeX file. Upper and lower cases for the file ending are ignored. In all other cases, nothing will happen.

Parameters:
file -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
Method Detail

writeTextFile

public final void writeTextFile(java.io.File file,
                                KineticLawGenerator klg)
                         throws java.io.IOException
This method writes the ordinary differential equation system given by the KineticLawGenerator into a plain text file. Note that the file extension does not matter.

klg -

writeLaTeXFile

public final void writeLaTeXFile(java.io.File file,
                                 KineticLawGenerator klg)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. Use LaTeXExport.

This method writes the ordinary differential equation system given by the KineticLawGenerator into a LaTeX file for further processing. Note that the file extension does not matter.
